TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed PagesPerSheetDirection extends System.Enum

summary.span: 指定在打印介质单面上显示多页内容时的页面排列。

span.span: Specifies the arrangement of pages when more than one page of content appears on a single side of print media.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 主要用于以下目的使用此类型的值：Use the values of this type primarily for these purposes: - 作为的成员集合，这是一个属性的，这些值指示打印机支持页面布局。As members of the collection, which is a property of , these values indicate the page arrangements that the printer supports. - 值作为属性，此值指示要排列页面指定方向中的内容的打印机。As the value of the property of a , the value directs the printer to arrange pages of content in a specified direction. **未知**属性中永远不会使用值对象。The **Unknown** value is never used in properties of objects. 你决不能设置属性**未知**。You should never set a property to **Unknown**. 如果某一其他生成应用程序已创建*PrintTicket 文档*页每个表方向功能设置为无法识别的选项 (即，一个选项，中未定义[打印架构](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397))，则构造与该文档的应用程序中的对象将具有**未知**的值作为属性。If some other producing application has created a *PrintTicket document* that sets the pages-per-sheet-direction feature to an unrecognized option (that is, an option that is not defined in the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)), then a object in your application that is constructed with that document will have **Unknown** as the value of the property. 尽管和类不能被继承，可以扩展[打印架构](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)能够识别并不表示中的打印设备功能或类。Although the and classes cannot be inherited, you can extend the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397) to recognize print device features that are not accounted for in the or classes. 有关详细信息请参阅[NOTINBUILD： 如何： 打印架构和创建新的打印系统类扩展](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a3600218-1ea5-478a-9853-6560464f2885)。For more information see [NOTINBUILD: How to: Extend the Print Schema and Create New Print System Classes](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a3600218-1ea5-478a-9853-6560464f2885). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何测试打印机的功能以及如何配置打印作业来充分利用它们。The following example shows how to test a printer's capabilities and configure the print job to take advantage of them. [!code-cpp[XpsCreate#PrinterCapabilities](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/CPP/XpsCreate.cpp#printercapabilities)] [!code-csharp[XpsCreate#PrinterCapabilities](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/CSharp/XpsCreate.cs#printercapabilities)] [!code-vb[XpsCreate#PrinterCapabilities](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/visualbasic/xpscreate.vb#printercapabilities)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.PagesPerSheetDirection BottomLeft = int32(4)

summary.span: 页面以从上到下从右至左（相对于页面方向）的列方式显示。

span.span: Pages appear in columns, from top to bottom and right to left relative to page orientation.

summary.span: 页面以从上到下从左至右（相对于页面方向）的列方式显示。

span.span: Pages appear in columns, from top to bottom and left to right relative to page orientation.

summary.span: 页面以从右至左从上到下（相对于页面方向）的行方式显示。

span.span: Pages appear in rows, from right to left and top to bottom relative to page orientation.

summary.span: 页面以从右至左从下到上（相对于页面方向）的行方式显示。

span.span: Pages appear in rows, from right to left and bottom to top relative to page orientation.

summary.span: 页面以从左至右从上到下（相对于页面方向）的行方式显示。

span.span: Pages appear in rows, from left to right and top to bottom relative to page orientation.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.PagesPerSheetDirection RightTop = int32(5)

summary.span: 页面以从左至右从下到上（相对于页面方向）的行方式显示。

span.span: Pages appear in rows, from left to right and bottom to top relative to page orientation.

span.span: Pages appear in columns, from bottom to top and right to left relative to page orientation.

summary.span: 页面以从下到上从左至右（相对于页面方向）的列方式显示。

span.span: Pages appear in columns, from bottom to top and left to right relative to page orientation.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.PagesPerSheetDirection Unknown = int32(0)

summary.span: 该功能（其选项由此枚举表示）设置为未在[打印架构](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)中定义的选项。

span.span: The feature (whose options are represented by this enumeration) is set to an option not defined in the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397).
